MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.08am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations being required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:19pm on Sunday, 27 December 2020
